Before we proceed, I would like to propose an offer of $15000 for the product. This reflects its high quality and value, as well as my confidence in its ability to meet your needs. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer 
(3) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000

You chose to make a counteroffer to Bob.

Send your counteroffer to Alice.
